title: New Possible World and Plants
description: Had this idea for like a week or two in mind, but decided to show it off right now

fields.name: Hawaiian World
fields.value: World which has two parts. Part 1 is world like BWB with tides n' stuff, required Lily Pads. Part 2 is a volcano like Lava Reef.

fields.name: Lava Guava
fields.value: Plant identical to its PvZ2 counterpart

fields.name: Gimmick #1 — Tides
fields.value: The same gimmick from BWB from PvZ2

fields.name: Gimmick #2 — Low Tides
fields.value: Spawns zombies on big waves and when tide is going away

fields.name: Gimmick #3 — lava
fields.value: Spawns lava tiles randomly all over the lawn
